page.title: 15HAWICK RUGBY CLUB.
page.content: Hawick Rugby Club is over lOO years old. The club has a most famous history including many Scottish championships and Border League titles and it has produced 48 internationalists, including the most capped Scottish player, Jim Renwick, with 52 caps. Mansfield Park is a well organised ground with a big stand as well as clubrooms and squash courts. It is a very busy place between September and April with as many as 3OOO people attending some matches. It requires hard work on the part of the committee who have to organise these matches as well as making arrangements when the team travel to play away from home. The ground staff also work very hard to keep the pitch in good order and to keep the whole ground looking nice.
